Functional Equivalence of Ankylosis
38 CFR 4.40
and
4.45
apply when considering whether LOM results in the functional equivalence of ankylosis of the joint.
The functional equivalence of ankylosis arises when application of the
effect of pain or other factors identified under
38 CFR 4.40
or
4.45
, to include during flare-ups and repetitive use over time, results in additional loss of motion to the joint that effectively results in functional impairment consistent with ankylosis.
